thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express San Francisco Airport-North - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (South San Francisco, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Service oriented staff!
thread.title_full: Service oriented staff! - Review of Holiday Inn Express San Francisco Airport-North, South San Francisco, CA - TripAdvisor

author: _jdiazarciga
title: Service oriented staff!
text:
I find hotel near the airports to be very neutral and with little differentiation, but I was impressed by how service oriented the staff at this hotel is.
The lady who checked me in on 3/2 evening was very kind. She called me a few minutes later just to check if everything was OK with my room. It has been a while since I received a similar call from a hotel employee.
